content:
# It appears that I no longer have any coal in my inventory, which means I need to gather some fuel to operate the stone furnace.
# I will need to find a nearby coal resource patch to gather coal.

# First, I will search for the nearest coal resource patch.
nearest_coal_patch = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Locate the nearest coal resource patch.
move_to(nearest_coal_patch)  # Move to the nearest coal patch to gather coal.
